name: Chris Flash - A 2D Platformer Game
description:
CHRIS FLASH is a 2D platformer that tests how far and how hard you'll try to survive and escape from the aliens after getting superspeed powers. Run, Chris, Run! 

With an original soundtrack & awesome gameplay, it's up to you to escape the aliens!

Instructions

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Pick up Coins to raise your score
  • Be careful of hazards!
  • Escape the aliens!
